content: *this is a beautiful cloak for the first chill of fall the matching hat includes a fun decorative flower lion brand yarn * skill level easy level 2 homespun® article #790 4 balls *windsor* *materials are sufficient to make the set * crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm gauge \ double_crochet chain 1 6 times = 4 inches \ 10 cm hat is worked in rounds finish with large flower see also cape and cloche #40464-1c cape 1 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cape-and-cloche-40464-1c-cape
